remarks.para: May be inoperative provided EICAS Advisory message GEAR DOORS is verified to be operative.

placard.para: Placard light "LIGHT INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

warning.para: REFER TO MAINTENANCE MANUAL 32-00-15 FOR LOCK INSTALLATION PROCEDURE. RAPID ACTION OF DOORS MAY CAUSE INJURY OR DAMAGE IF LOCKS ARE NOT PROPERLY INSTALLED.

numlitem.para: Confirm that advisory level message GEAR DOORS illuminated after 35 second time delay.
